CustomField.formula: IF( OR( HOUR( Start_Time__c) = 0, HOUR( Start_Time__c) = 12 ), '12', TEXT( IF( HOUR( Start_Time__c) > 12, HOUR( Start_Time__c) - 12, HOUR( Start_Time__c) ) ) ) & ":" & IF ( MINUTE( Start_Time__c) < 10, "0" + TEXT( MINUTE( Start_Time__c) ), TEXT( MINUTE( Start_Time__c) ) ) & IF ( HOUR( Start_Time__c) < 12, " AM", " PM" )
CustomField.label: TECH_Start_Time
